TI_TEXT.P: Бизнес услуги: право, маркетинг, консултиране, набиране на персонал, печат и охрана
Obchodní služby: právní, marketingové, poradenské služby, nábor zaměstnanců, tiskařské a bezpečnostní služby
Forretningstjenesteydelser: forskrifter, markedsføring, rådgivning, rekruttering, trykning og sikkerhed
Dienstleistungen für Unternehmen: Recht, Marketing, Consulting, Einstellungen, Druck und Sicherheit

Business services: law, marketing, consulting, recruitment, printing and security
Servicios a empresas: legislación, mercadotecnia, asesoría, selección de personal, imprenta y seguridad
Õigus-, turundus-, nõustamis-, värbamis-, trüki- ja turvaalased kommertsteenused

Services aux entreprises: droit, marketing, conseil, recrutement, impression et sécurité
Business services: law, marketing, consulting, recruitment, printing and security
Poslovne usluge: pravo, marketing, savjetovanje, zapošljavanje, tiskanje i sigurnost
Üzleti szolgáltatások: jog, marketing, tanácsadás, munkaerő-felvétel, nyomtatás és biztonság
Servizi per le imprese: servizi giuridici, di marketing, di consulenza, di reclutamento, di stampa e di sicurezza
Verslo paslaugos: teisinės, rinkodaros, konsultavimo, įdarbinimo, spausdinimo ir apsaugos
Uzņēmējdarbības pakalpojumi: tiesības, tirgzinība, konsultēšana, darbinieku vervēšana, iespiešana un drošība
Servizzi ta' negozju: Liġi, kummerċjalizzazzjoni, konsulenza, reklutaġġ, stampar u sigurtà
Zakelijke dienstverlening: juridisch, marketing, consulting, drukkerij en beveiliging
Usługi biznesowe: prawnicze, marketingowe, konsultingowe, rekrutacji, drukowania i zabezpieczania
Serviços a empresas: direito, comercialização, consultoria, recrutamento, impressão e segurança
Servicii pentru întreprinderi: drept, marketing, consultanţă, recrutare, tipărire şi securitate
Podnikateľské služby: právo, marketing, konzultácie, nábor pracovníkov, tlačiarenské a bezpečnostné služby
Poslovne storitve: pravo, trženje, svetovanje, zaposlovanje, tiskanje in varnost
Företagstjänster: lagstiftning, marknadsföring, rådgivning, rekrytering, tryckning och säkerhet

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland Limited

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland Limited

TITLE.P: Sales representative services for Apros process simulation software

SHORT_DESCR.P: Apros is a versatile software product for modelling and simulation of thermal and nuclear power plants, energy systems and other processes. Apros is used world-wide by engineering and utility companies, equipment suppliers, safety authorities, universities and research organizations. The objective of the tender process is to find sales representatives to the target regions Europe, Asia (excluding China and India) and North America, offering sales services of Apros software, to promote the sales of the Apros-related offering described in the invitation to tender. The procurement has been divided into 3 parts (lots) according to the target regions:
Tenderers may give separate tenders for one or more parts. The procurement is described in detail in the Invitation to Tender documents.

The objective of the tender process is to find sales representatives offering sales services of Apros software, to promote the sales of the Apros-related offering described in the invitation to tender in Europe. VTT will choose at least 1 and no more than 5 suppliers to provide the service in Europe. The procurement is described in detail in the Invitation to Tender documents.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Preliminary plan for providing the sales representative service
Simulation case using the demo version

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contract period is 3 years. After the fixed 3 year contract period, the agreement will be valid until further notice with 6 months’ notice.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: VTT reserves an option for possible minor collaboration related to other activities, e.g., professional services, which would be agreed case by case.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The objective of the tender process is to find sales representatives offering sales services of Apros software, to promote the sales of the Apros-related offering described in the invitation to tender in Asia (excluding China and India). VTT will choose at least 1 and no more than 5 suppliers to provide the service in Asia (excluding China and India). The procurement is described in detail in the Invitation to Tender documents.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Preliminary plan for providing the sales representative service
Simulation case using the demo version

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contract period is 3 years. After the fixed 3 year contract period, the agreement will be valid until further notice with 6 months’ notice.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: VTT reserves an option for possible minor collaboration related to other activities, e.g., professional services, which would be agreed case by case.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The object of the tender process is to find sales representatives offering sales services of Apros software, to promote the sales of the Apros-related offering described in the Invitation to Tender in North America. VTT will choose at least 1 and no more than 5 suppliers to provide the service in North America. The procurement is described in detail in the Invitation to Tender documents.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Preliminary plan for providing the sales representative service
Simulation case using the demo version

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The contract period is 3 years. After the fixed 3 year contract period, the agreement will be valid until further notice with 6 months’ notice.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: VTT reserves an option for possible minor collaboration related to other activities, e.g., professional services, which would be agreed case by case.

SUITABILITY.P: As stated in the Invitation to Tender documents.

INFO_ADD.P: The given date is preliminary. VTT reserves the right to change the scheduled date. The opening of tenders shall not be a public event.
